title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Instructional Theory Framework for Digital Math Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can design mathematical problem-solving simulations utilizing the six core principles of instructional theory frameworks.
Learners can spatially visualize mathematical concepts in a VR environment and experiment through 3D modeling.
Students can iteratively improve their digital learning experiences based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
